net.tvburger.jdl.common.numbers.NumberTypeAgnostic

Package
Description
net.tvburger.jdl.adaline
Provides the implementation of Bernard Widrow and Ted Hoff's ADALINE (1960)
net.tvburger.jdl.datasets
Package to obtain data sets to be used with estimation functions

Provides the implementation of k-Nearest Neighbors

Implementation of the MultiLayer Perceptron

Defines the concepts for estimation functions
net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn
Defines the neural network as specialization of an estimation function
net.tvburger.jdl.model.scalars
Defines scalar functions
net.tvburger.jdl.model.training
Defines the concepts related for training an estimation function
net.tvburger.jdl.perceptron
Provides the implementation of Frank Rosenblatt's Perceptron (1958)

    Interface
    Description
    interface 
    EstimationFunction<N extends Number>
    The EstimationFunction.estimate(N[]) method defines the contract for mapping input values to output values according to a specific estimation algorithm.

    Classes in net.tvburger.jdl.model.nn that implement NumberTypeAgnostic
    Modifier and Type
    Class
    Description
    class 
    ActivationsCachedNeuron
    A Neuron that caches activations for later retrieval.
    class 
    DefaultNeuralNetwork
    Provides a standard implementation for a neural network.
    class 
    InputNeuron
    Represents an input neuron in a neural network.
    class 
    LastInputStoredNeuron
    A specialized Neuron that remembers the input values from its most recent activation.
    class 
    Neuron
    Represents a single artificial neuron in a neural network.
